name: Veneficium
description:
Being on your guard will become second nature in Veneficium, a survival-horror game developed by a passionate team. Play as Abigail Vandran, a witch who has only one goal in mind: to find her grandmother Willow and escape a forest of death... Only if she survives the wrath of the demons lurking in the mist.

⛧ 𝘐𝘮𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘴𝘪𝘷𝘦 𝘌𝘹𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘪𝘦𝘯𝘤𝘦: Explore a realistic environment set deep in the woods, filled with hair-raising sounds that are sure to hold you spellbound.



⛧ 𝘚𝘵𝘦𝘢𝘭𝘵𝘩: Be careful where you step and use your environment to your advantage in escaping unpredictable enemies, or it may cost you your life.



⛧ 𝘎𝘭𝘰𝘰𝘮𝘺 𝘈𝘵𝘮𝘰𝘴𝘱𝘩𝘦𝘳𝘦: Find your way in foggy surroundings strewed with trees and mysterious locations, with your lantern as your only light. Step upon traces of dark and wicked practices that will chill you to the bone.



⛧ 𝘚𝘱𝘦𝘭𝘭𝘤𝘢𝘴𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨: Gather ingredients and create spells from your book of shadows that will help you escape your enemy's notice.
